title: Dress Like an Egyptian, an interview with Egyptologist Dr. Colleen Darnell
itunes:title: Dress Like an Egyptian, an interview with Egyptologist Dr. Colleen Darnell
description:
This week we talk to Egyptologist--and vintage fashion aficionada-- Dr. Colleen Darnell about the role of clothing and artifice in the lives of the Ancient Egyptians. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
